title: Lose lp for a win???
body: Just like to know why i lose lp for a win sometimes just lost 1lp and we won??? Have seen this a few times and it pisses me off because i certainly don't get lp when i lose? Had two games with an afk today and lost both as a result so was hoping to even it out a bit with this win but when i checked.....

replies.body: i got that 3 times in a row -.- so i went "stuff your stupid lp somewhere else rito, im climbing whether you like it or not" and continued on with my life

It means your MMR is too low for your division.
So the game wants to force you down a division.
